name: .WUP
summary: Learn about .WUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To play the game a WUP file contains, you must:
Use USBHelperInstaller to transfer the file to your Wii U's SD card.
Insert your SD card back into your Wii U.
Use WUP Installer GX2 to install the game your WUP file contains.
Then, the game will appear in your Wii U's menu. For more detailed instructions, click here.
